title: 求看服务端崩溃报告重赏@！！
author: hcs61256cs
txt_content: 提示: 作者被禁止或删除 内容自动屏蔽

replies.author: 名不够响亮
replies.txt_content:
在config文件夹里forge.cfg配置文件
用notepad++打开他
会看到
    # Set this to true to remove any Entity that throws an error in its update method instead of closing the server and reporting a crash log. BE WARNED THIS COULD SCREW UP EVERYTHING USE SPARINGLY WE ARE NOT RESPONSIBLE FOR DAMAGES.
    B:removeErroringEntities=true
    # Set this to true to remove any TileEntity that throws an error in its update method instead of closing the server and reporting a crash log. BE WARNED THIS COULD SCREW UP EVERYTHING USE SPARINGLY WE ARE NOT RESPONSIBLE FOR DAMAGES.
    B:removeErroringTileEntities=true

这两个是自动移除崩服实体和实体方块的设置
都是true的话，就能免疫实体崩服.
楼主就是实体导致崩服，具体是什么实体看不出来

replies.author: BadTomato
replies.txt_content:
这是实体错误引发的 ，是一个ID为6766物品，它上面有的NBT在读取的时候与其他实体发生冲突
null (net.minecraft.entity.player.EntityPlayerMP)

Entity's Block location: World: (-98,85,103), Chunk: (at 14,5,7 in -7,6; contains blocks -112,0,96 to -97,255,111), Region: (-1,0; contains chunks -32,0 to -1,31, blocks -512,0,0 to -1,255,511)
建议解决方法是将地图文件region中的r-1,0.mca移除，如果不想删这么大区块还是推荐用chunkfixer

replies.author: hcs61256cs
replies.txt_content: 提示: 作者被禁止或删除 内容自动屏蔽
